properties.name: kafka.groupId
properties.description: The group id to use for kafka.

properties.name: kafka.clientId
properties.description: The client id to use for kafka.

properties.name: kafka.bootstrap.servers
properties.description: The servers to use for bootstrapping kafka.

properties.name: qad.maxAngleDeviation
properties.description: The maximum deviation from the heading of the segment.

properties.name: qad.maxLengthDeviation
properties.description: The maximum percentual deviation of a match candidate from the length of the segment.

properties.name: qad.stops.startThresholdSpeed
properties.description: The speed at which a stop starts.

properties.name: qad.stops.endThresholdSpeed
properties.description: The speed at which a stop ends.

properties.name: qad.model.segments.bufferSize
properties.description: The size of the buffer around segments.

properties.name: qad.densify.numPoints
properties.description: The number of points to insert between each measurement.
